answers.answer: I have 18 days left with a boy as well I'm so ready
35 days left until my little boy's due date, but might be having a c-section early because he is breech :-/
I have 43... I'm already dilated to a 1 and every since they checked me on Tuesday I've been getting way more BH!!! It's crazy.

18 days to go and my hips hurt so bad at times U can barely walk. My legs and feet are si swollen it looks like a giant sausage. :(  1 cm 50%effaced still as of last check. Walking, birthing ball, and pressure points are not helping. I am hoping to go by my due date because I am a vbac and dr wont induce me its either natural or section again:(

I am so swollen to! An my back an hips hurt non stop. I'm just ready for her to be here... I find myself somedays being depressed bc my body wants to give up. This is baby number four and the hardest I've had yet.

I have 25 days left until my due date but I might be induced early so maybe only 18 days! Definitely uncomfortable and ready for my little guy to be here! Doctor has me on bed rest because he's afraid I'm going develope preeclampsia soon /: he definitely dropped and his head is right on my cervix at all times! But I'm unfortunately at a 0cm and not effaced ): hoping to start dilating soon though!
20 days left!!!!Cant wait till i can hold my son :)Im still working but getting very tired a lot!

@Ashley I understand the depressed part. This is hard  and my husband is deployed i tell him how im feeling and he laughs at me. Scared to do this labor all alone.  My twins i was alone too. Its depressing!
40 days to go until I meet my babygirl! Hopefully sooner! Besides heartburn back and rib pain I'm feeling great!

I have 20 days left and as of my last appt I'm not dilated at all. :( I'm ready to meet my baby boy. We're so close it feels unreal! My feet are swollen, but other than that I'm feeling good right now.

48 days to go (keeping my fingers crossed he comes sooner)! Feeling okay most days. I am exhausted after work and my legs and feet have really started swelling. I am so ready to meet my little man! When did your Dr's start checking to see if you are dilated and effaced?

I have 27 days left until my csection unless little man decides he wants to come early :) I have a lot of pelvic pressure and pain but other than that I'm feeling pretty good just ready for him to be here
48 days left and I'm 1cm dialated. I'm so excited!!
I have 22 days to go. I was 2 cm dialated last Friday! (:
35 days left til I'm due.. But no one thinks I'll make it!! I've been in preterm labor.. so hopefully in the next 2 weeks-3 weeks!!
18 days.. with a girl. One more week of work til leave.. and i hurt like H*LL!

question: How many days left for u? And how are u feeling? I have 19 days left and I feel great...can't wait to meet my lil man...excited were getting so close :)
title: october mommies
